summary: On an out of control train holding hostages and high-tech bio-weapons agent Kristoff (Van Damme) becomes a one man army to derail the terrorists and save the lives of everyone on board!
cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme|Tomas Arana|Laura Harring|Susan Gibney|Lucy Jenner|Jessica Bowman|Kris Van Damme|John Bishop|Binky van Bilderbeek|Dayton Callie|Simona Williams|Sandra Vidal|Stefanos Miltsakakis|Jimmy Jean-Louis|George Stanchev|Nikolai Binev|Stanimir Stamatov|Danko Jordanov|Trayan Milenov-Troy|Emil Tonev|Velizar Peev|Nikolai Sotirov|Ventzislav Kisyov|Dobrin Dosev|Ivan Ivanov|Daniel Tzotchev|Toshko Petrov|Peter Mechkoff|Vasil Banov|Meglena Karalambova|Kitodar Todorov|Elena Markova|Kaloyan Lenkov|Stoyan Izenev|Emil Videv|Radoslav Hrostolov|Ivaylo Geraskov|Bilyana Trayanova|Ivaylo Nalbantov
title: Sin control
